summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Bagley Avenue, from the south line of the North Addition of Remsberg's Home Tract, to North 77th Street; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
